page.title: 18HOW WE GOT TO PORTISHEAD
page.content: On Monday 25th of November ILG went to Portishead.We got there by bus, the number{359.}It cost 75 pence each It was a cloudy morning at 9.30am when we caught the bus from Bower Ashton. We got off the bus in the High Street and walked for about a mile and a half.We played games on the beach and walked up to the{lighthouse and played on the rocks .We caught the bus back from the High Street at quarter past two. On the way back alot of people sat at the back.It was a good day out and the day did brighten up. ANNE THEOBALD
